name: Email Classification & Summarization
description: Automatically classifies incoming emails into categories (urgent, client, invoice, newsletter, spam) and generates AI summaries.

name: Invoice Payment Reminders
description: Sends automated payment reminders for overdue invoices. First reminder at 3 days, second at 7 days, escalation at 14 days.

name: Meeting Prep Brief Generator
description: Generates AI-powered meeting prep briefs 1 hour before each scheduled meeting, including client background, open invoices, and talking points.

name: Weekly Business Report
description: Generates a comprehensive weekly business report every Monday morning with revenue, client activity, email stats, and AI insights.

name: New Lead Onboarding
description: When a new client is added, automatically creates a Google Drive folder, sends welcome email, creates onboarding tasks, and notifies via Slack.

name: Stale Lead Alerts
description: Checks for clients in lead/contacted stage not contacted in 7+ days and creates alerts with recommended actions.
